nodes.text: Cale Herron was a male Zabrak slicer who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
Cale Herron was a slicer who lived in Mos Taike, on the planet Tatooine. He also owned a outpost on Lok.

Circa 1 ABY, he started investigate the disappearance of several scientists when he was contacted by a spacer who was investigating the assassination of Derg Prantis and Bera Jeza, from Mos Eisley Biolab. The spacer had found on Prantis's corpse a data disk with Derg Prantis's last words and instructions to contact Cale Herron. Herron tasked the spacer to investigate a secret laboratory on Lok. From a mysterious datapad found next to the body of a dead Twi'lek, they eventually discovered the Blackwing outbreak on Dathomir.

Cale Herron appeared as a non-player character (NPC) in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Cale Herron was added to the game with the "Game Update 13", released on September 30, 2009. This NPC was part of the questline "Something is Obviously Wrong", an introduction to the "Death Troopers" update.
